overview:
Neil performs technical due diligence for Selby, and advises portfolio companies on engineering and technical matters. He has acted as Interim Chief Technology Officer for start up companies that have yet to hire their permanent engineering management, and has consulted with companies to provide hands-on assistance in specifying, configuring, and installing operational infrastructure.

Before joining Selby as technical advisor, Neil was CTO of E-greetings Network, where he built the engineering team, set up operational policies and infrastructure and architected original systems. Previously he held senior management and engineering positions at Sun Microsystems, Amorphous Systems, Mitsumi Technology, Amiga Computers and HP.

Neil earned a BSEE from Johns Hopkins University. Away from work, Neil is absorbed with raising his children, hiking, and biking.
